sourcesContent:
import { StyleSheet, Text, View, Image } from "react-native";
import { Card } from "react-native-paper";
import React from "react";

export default function Home() {
  return (
    <View style={styles.container}>
      <View style={styles.container2}>
        <Card style={styles.card}>
          <View>
            <Text style={{ fontSize: 30 }}>
              Seja bem-vindo(a) ao sistema Turis Info!
            </Text>
            <Text style={{ fontSize: 20, marginTop: 20 }}>
              Quais opções voce deseja visitar?
            </Text>
          </View>
          <View>
            <Card style={styles.card2}>
              <Card.Title title="Cadastrar passageiros" />
              <Card.Cover source={require('../assets/peoples.png')} />
            </Card>
            <Card style={styles.card2}>
              <Text style={{ fontSize: 15 }}>Consultar mensalidades</Text>
            </Card>
            <Card style={styles.card2}>
              <Text style={{ fontSize: 15 }}>Consultar Viagens</Text>
            </Card>
          </View>
        </Card>
      </View>
    </View>
  );
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  container: {
    flex: 1,
    alignItems: "center",
    justifyContent: "center",
    backgroundColor: "#DFDFDF",
  },
  container2: {
    flex: 1,
    alignItems: "center",
    justifyContent: "center",
    backgroundColor: "#A4E3F9",
    width: "90%",
    maxHeight: "95%",
    borderRadius: 15,
    borderWidth: 1,
    borderColor: "#004A85",
  },
  card: {
    flex: 1,
    backgroundColor: "#DFDFDF",
    width: "90%",
    maxHeight: "98%",
    borderRadius: 15,
    borderWidth: 1,
    borderColor: "#004A85",
    padding: 15,
  },
  card2: {
    flex: 1,
    backgroundColor: "#ffffff",
    width: '25%',
    maxHeight: '50%',
    borderRadius: 15,
    borderWidth: 2,
    borderColor: "#004A85",
    padding: 10,
  },
});
